name: Stretched Profile
description:
Simply put this will make the page you view when on your Chatango account stretch across the full screen. It removes the pesky Ad's little space completely and fills that empty space up nicely with your friends and profile.

<a href="http://vii-encoding.weebly.com/" target="_blank">VII-Encoding™</font>
additional_info:
This will stretch your friend list and profile further then normal. Simply hover over the little section between your mini profile and friend list. Click that and drag the profile back to its original size. Your friend list will still remain much wider however. But who really cares? You do not have to see those pesky ad's, or a blank space if you have ad blocker

Signed: <a href="http://vii-encoding.weebly.com/" target="_blank">VII-Encoding™</font>
